Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Irethoreru with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an incised adze and the string of the seed-bag which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg-section is inscribed with a column of black painted hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet(broken).
Condition: broken - section from the back of the foot has broken away
